titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of the week of June 18 through June 24, 2023, as "National Firefighter Safety Week" in the United States and supporting the goals and ideals of National Firefighter Safety Week to raise awareness of the fire risks associated with improper disposal of lithium-ion batteries.

A resolution expressing support for the designation of the week of June 18 through June 24, 2023, as "National Firefighter Safety Week" in the United States and supporting the goals and ideals of National Firefighter Safety Week to raise awareness of the fire risks associated with improper disposal of lithium-ion batteries.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of National Firefighter Safety Week and supports community outreach programs that educate the public about the potential hazards and proper response to lithium-ion battery incidents.
